'''Fight Club Legend''' is [[Arataki Itto]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*When sprinting or after using [[Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst!]], Itto's auto-attack pattern does not reset. However, running, walking, or jumping will reset the auto-attack pattern.
*The number of Superlative Superstrength Stacks Itto has is indicated by the number of glowing spots on a transparent oni mask behind him, as well as the strength of the glow of the entire mask. The spots light up in this order: the mask's right eye, the mask's left eye, below the nose, nose bridge, and forehead.
*Superlative Superstrength stacks are reset upon entering a different instance. [[Domains]], [[instance]]s, and different worlds such as [[Teyvat]] and the [[Serenitea Pot]] are all considered different instances. Restarting a Domain will also reset Superlative Strength stacks.
*Superlative Superstrength stacks can be gained from Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst! even while Itto is not the active character.
*Superlative Strength Duration is refreshed for all stacks upon gaining a new stack, including when Itto already has 5 stacks.
**Stacks are not lost when switching characters.
*{{Talent Note|conversion|character=Itto|talent=Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!|Geo|10}} Additionally, when Itto is under the effects of [[Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!]], he also gains 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength upon landing a hit with his normal attack string's first and third attacks.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
*{{Talent Note|character=Arataki Itto|talent=Fight Club Legend|ascension|1|Arataki Ichiban|When Arataki Itto uses consecutive Arataki Kesagiri, each slash increases the ATK SPD of the next slash by 10% to up to 30% and increases his resistance to interruption.}}
*{{Talent Note|character=Arataki Itto|talent=Fight Club Legend|ascension|2|Bloodline of the Crimson Oni}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
*{{Talent Note|constellation|1|Stay a While and Listen Up}}
*{{Talent Note|constellation|6|Arataki Itto, Present!}}
